start.newSeedPhrase.description: Below is the new seed phrase for your account. Save them somewhere safe and secret.
start.confirmSeedPhrase.description: Input seed phrase that was generated before. It consists of 12 words.
start.complete.description: Your wallet has been created. Start using Alice by clicking the button below.
start.importSeedPhrase.description: Input existing seed phrase. It consists of 12 words.
start.inputSeedPhraseNotice:
All words are in lower case.
Each word is separated by a space.

exchange.title: Exchanges
exchange.description: Below is a list of exchanges for DAI token. After purchasing assets and transferring them to 'My Ethereum Address', you can use them in Alice.
exchange.popularTokens.description: Most actively traded tokens for the last 24 hours.

trade.wouldYouCancelYourOrder: Would you cancel your order? You cannot undo this after done.
trade.orderCancelFailure: Failure cancelling your order. Please try again.
trade.clickUnsettledOrderToCancel: Click unsettled orders to cancel them.

asset.myAssetsInAliceNetwork.description: Alice Network is compatible with Ethereum but offers much faster performance. Deposit your assets now and utilize financial services!
asset.myAssets.description: Deposit assets from Ethereum network and use financial services now!
asset.ethereumWallet.description: You can transfer assets in Ethereum Wallet to any account in ethereum network.
asset.aliceWallet.description: You need to deposit assets into Alice Wallet to utilize financial services.
asset.deposit.description: Your assets will be transferred from Ethereum network to Alice network
asset.deposit.warning: Transferring to Alice network could take 2-3 minutes depending on the congestion level of Ethereum network.
asset.tokenConversion.description: Select the token that the asset will be converted. You can start savings right away on Alice if you convert to DAI.
asset.withdrawal.description: Your assets will be transferred from Alice network to Ethereum network.
asset.withdrawal.warning: Transferring to Ethereum network could take 2-3 minutes depending on the congestion level of Ethereum network.
asset.wouldYouChangeTheDepositAmount: Would you change the deposit amount?
asset.depositSuccess: After 15 blocks of confirmation, deposit shall be done.
asset.depositChangeFailure: Failure changing your deposit. Please try again.
asset.transfer.confirm: You requested to transfer {{amount}} {{symbol}} to {{address}}. Would you proceed?
asset.ethRecommend: We recommend that you leave a amount of 0.01 ETH or smaller.
asset.willNotEnoughEthereum: The amount of ETH remaining may not be sufficient for the next transfer.
asset.notEnoughEthereum: The amount of ETH remaining is not enough.

profile.myAddress.description: Send yours assets to 'My Ethereum Address' and check it in Alice.
profile.addressCopiedToTheClipboard: 'My Ethereum Address' is copied to the clipboard.
profile.backupSeedPhrase.description: If you ever change your mobile device, you will need this seed phrase to access your accounts. Save them somewhere safe and secret.
profile.backupSeedPhrase.warning: DO NOT share this phrase with anyone. These words can be used to steal all account.
profile.seedPhraseCopiedToTheClipboard: Your seed phrase is copied to the clipboard.
profile.resetAccount.description: All information for my account is wiped out.
profile.resetAccount.requirement: To reset the account, you need to type in your seed phrase. Back it up before reset.
profile.resetAccount.warning: This is an irreversible action. If you didn't backup your seed words, all your assets will be out of control!
profile.customerSupport.description: This will redirect you to our telegram channel.
profile.name: Name

finance.start.description: A small amount of ETH (less than 0.1) and DAI is required to use Alice's services.
finance.savings.description: Deposit your DAI stable coins and start savings with 8% of maximum annual interest rate. You can withdraw coins whenever you want.
finance.startSaving.description: Savings on Alice, powered by smart contracts, guarantee you can withdraw your assets at any time.
finance.amountGreaterThanBalance: The amount must be less than or equal to your balance.
finance.savingsFailure: Failure starting savings. Please try again.
finance.withdrawSavings.description: You can withdraw some or all amounts.
finance.loan.description: Deposit tokens as collateral which you believe whose price will increase and you will get paid for your DAI stable coins.

update.title: There is an essential update
update.description: The app will restart for the update. The update can take tens of seconds.
